data.enText: to start burning again; to make sth start burning again
The oven burners reignite automatically if blown out.
data.chText: 烤炉的火如果吹灭了会自动再点燃。

data.enText: You may need to reignite the pilot light.
Their passion was reignited by a romantic trip to Venice.
data.chText: 去威尼斯的浪漫之旅重新燃起了他们的激情。

tr: ignite anew, as of something burning
example: The strong winds reignited the cooling embers
